name: Herald of Darkness
description: The Herald of Darkness is a Large Fiend embodying shadows, with a formidable appearance that instills fear. It has a strong physical presence, enhanced by its robust chain shirt.
memorable: This creature's ability to paralyze foes and control the battlefield with necrotic damage makes it a significant threat.
goals: To instill fear and chaos, typically through combat and manipulation.
relations: May serve other powerful fiends or dark entities in the realm of shadows.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy locales, often associated with malevolent forces.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage, plus strong physical and magical defenses.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and has a lower Intelligence score.
attacks: Can execute multiattacks with necrotic-infused abilities that paralyze and deal substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Majesty of the Abyss: Unleashes a wave of infernal power that causes significant necrotic damage and can blind and paralyze.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 240 feet and has a passive Perception score of 15.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Deception, Perception, and Stealth, allowing for both physical prowess and cunning.
additional_information: Immune to exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned.
Can transform into a Large shadow or revert back to its fiend form with no statistical changes.
Resistance to bludgeoning, cold, and lightning damage enhances its survivability.
Can surprise enemies by moving through narrow spaces.
Darkvision does not hinder its ability to see in magical darkness.
test_queries: powerful fiend that causes paralysis and fear
large shadowy fiend with necrotic attacks
creature immune to necrotic damage and poison
